name: GoAnywhere MFT
tag_list: encryption, managed-file-transfer, secure-ftp, secure-ftp-server, iseries, as400, linux, unix, solaris, macos, windows, aix, ftp-server
overview:
GoAnywhereâ„¢ is a managed file transfer (MFT) solution that allows organizations to secure and automate the exchange of data with their trading partners, customers, employees and internal systems.

The GoAnywhere solution is comprised of the GoAnywhere Directorâ„¢, GoAnywhere Servicesâ„¢ and GoAnywhere Gatewayâ„¢ products.

GoAnywhere Directorâ„¢ streamlines and manages data movement through a centralized approach. It allows an organization to connect to almost any system (internal or external) and securely exchange data using a wide variety of standard protocols.

With support for FTP, FTPS, SFTP, HTTP, HTTPS, AS2, SMTP, ZIP, multiple databases, error handling and more, GoAnywhere Director can manage the complex business requirements related to securing and managing sensitive data transfers.

GoAnywhere Servicesâ„¢ allows external trading partners, customers and employees to to initiate and securely exchange files with the company. GoAnywhere Services is controlled through an intuitive browser-based interface, and includes security features and audit trails for meeting internal security policies and complying with PCI DSS, HIPAA, GLBA and state privacy laws.

GoAnywhere Gatewayâ„¢ is both an enhanced reverse proxy and forward proxy, providing an an additional layer of network security when an organization needs to safely exchange data with its trading partners. No incoming ports need to be opened into an organization’s private/internal network and no sensitive information needs to be stored in the DMZ.
